tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: It has been said that people who read for pleasure have more developed imaginations and better language skills than people who prefer to watch TV. Do you agree or disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
